The steam function adds an extra layer of care and protection to your hair while styling.

3. The Remington Pro 1–1.5" Pearl Ceramic Curling Wand offers a conical barrel with crushed pearl coating for smooth, shiny waves. With 9 heat settings, 410°F max, and auto shutoff, it’s great for quick, frizz-free, salon-style curls. The pearl coating helps reduce damage and enhance shine, making it a good choice for most hair types.

4. The GHD Curve Soft Curl Iron has a 1.25" barrel and Ultra-Zone™ tech that maintains 365°F for consistent, safe styling. With fast 25-second heat-up, spring clamp, and auto sleep mode, it's ideal for voluminous, long-lasting curls on all hair types. GHD is known for its quality and consistency, making this a reliable choice for salon-quality curls at home.

Each of these curling irons has its unique features, so consider which factors are most important to you (e.g., infrared technology, ease of use, versatility, consistent heat, etc.) when making your decision.
